name: GetPersonRelationships
description:
Retrieve a list of objects a person is related to.

Use this tool to obtain a list of relationships associated with a specific person. It supports pagination for retrieving results in multiple pages. Note that duplicates may appear across pages.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the customer whose relationships you wish to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The ID of the customer you want to perform an operation against.

parameters.name: pagination_start_token
parameters.description: Token to specify the page of results to return. Use the `next` property's value from a previous response to get subsequent pages.

value_schema.description: The token for the page of results you want to return. Responses contain a `next` property. Use this property as the `start` value to return the next page of results.

parameters.name: max_results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results you want to retrieve per page.
